From: Dr. Sarah Chen <sarah.chen@paradigmhealth.com>
To: Austin Hollis <austin@clearwater.com>
Date: 2026-02-08
Subject: RE: HIPAA Compliance Discussion

Austin,

Thank you for reaching out. Our recent OCR audit revealed critical gaps in our security controls, and the board is demanding a comprehensive compliance roadmap before our Q2 meeting.

We have a 60-day remediation window, and I'm looking for immediate fractional CISO leadership to help us address these findings.

Can we schedule a call next week to discuss your approach?

Best regards,
Dr. Sarah Chen
Chief Medical Officer
Paradigm Health

user_input.summary: Email received from CFO Jennifer Lopez after intro by Dr. Chen
user_input.raw_content:
From: Jennifer Lopez <jennifer.lopez@paradigmhealth.com>
To: Austin Hollis <austin@clearwater.com>
Cc: Dr. Sarah Chen <sarah.chen@paradigmhealth.com>
Date: 2026-02-09
Subject: RE: Budget Discussion - HIPAA Assessment

Austin,

Sarah asked me to connect with you regarding the HIPAA assessment proposal.

I understand the compliance urgency, but I need to understand the ROI. Budget is tight this quarter, and I need to justify the investment to our CEO.

That said, our counsel has warned us that OCR penalties could reach $2.3M if we don't address these findings. If your assessment can help us avoid that exposure, it's worth discussing.

Can you send over a preliminary scope and pricing structure?

Best regards,
Jennifer Lopez
Chief Financial Officer
